Class MercatorProjectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.metrics.cube.tile.MercatorProjectionUtil

extends Object
    Utilities for dealing with Google tiles.

      • getOffsetX

        public static int getOffsetX(double lat,
             double lng,
             int zoom)
        Returns:
        the X pixel offset within the tile

      • getOffsetY

        public static int getOffsetY(double lat,
             double lng,
             int zoom)
        Returns:
        the Y pixel offset within the tile.

      • getTileRect

        public static Rectangle2D.Double getTileRect(int x,
                             int y,
                             int zoom)
        Returns:
        a Rectangle2D with x = lon, y = lat, width=lonSpan, height=latSpan for an x,y,zoom as used by google.

      • isPlottable

        public static boolean isPlottable(Double lat,
                  Double lng)
        Google maps cover +/- 85 degrees only.
        Returns:
        true if the location is plottable on a map

      • toNormalisedPixelCoords

        public static Point2D toNormalisedPixelCoords(double lat,
                              double lng)
        Returns the lat/lng as an "Offset Normalized Mercator" pixel coordinate, this is a coordinate that runs from 0..1 in latitude and longitude with 0,0 being top left. Normalizing means that this routine can be used at any zoom level and then multiplied by a power of two to get actual pixel coordinates.

      • toTileX

        public static int toTileX(double lng,
          int zoom)
        Returns:
        The tile index for the longitude at the given zoom

      • toTileXY

        public static Point toTileXY(double lat,
             double lng,
             int zoom)
        Returns a point that is a google tile reference for the tile containing the lat/lng and at the zoom level.

      • toTileY

        public static int toTileY(double lat,
          int zoom)
        Returns:
        The tile index for the latitude at the given zoom
